mapper.update:
update t_service_fee_user_info
expire_order_no = #{expireOrderNo},
pause_order_no = #{pauseOrderNo},
disable_member_card_no = #{disableMemberCardNo},
franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
update_time = #{updateTime},
service_fee_generate_time = #{serviceFeeGenerateTime},
where uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select sfui.uid, sfui.pause_order_no , sfui.disable_member_card_no from t_service_fee_user_info sfui left join t_user_battery_member_card ubmc on ubmc.uid=sfui.uid left join t_user_info tui on tui.uid=sfui.uid where tui.battery_deposit_status=1 and tui.del_flag=0 and ubmc.member_card_status=1 limit #{offset},#{size}
